name: Spurious Sarcophagus
rules:
[ACT] >>> Remove target card in your graveyard from the game. If you do, add a revive counter to this item.

[ACT], Remove five revive counters from this item >>> Put target card that was removed from the game this way into your hand.
flavour: Nothin' quite like crackin' one o' these open! —Brann Bronzebeard

name: Sand Scarab
rules: If an opposing ally would be destroyed, you may remove it from the game instead.
flavour: We're gonna need a bigger boot. —Brann Bronzebeard

name: White Camel
rules:
Elusive

When you place a resource face up into your resource row, this ally has +3 ATK and Sentinel this turn.
flavour: Careful, they spit! —Brann Bronzebeard

name: Thrall the Earth-Warder
rules:
Assault 5, Mend 5

When Thrall deals damage to an opposing hero, put a 5 [MELEE] / 5 [HEALTH] Earth Elemental ally token into play with Protector.
flavour: Taretha . . . Cairne . . . Aggra . . . I will not fail you. I will not fail this world!

name: Daedak the Graveborne
rules:
Eternal, Protector

When this ally is destroyed, your hero deals 1 shadow damage for each resource you control to target opposing hero. Then, your hero heals 1 damage from itself for each damage dealt this way.

name: Brulu Breaks-the-Land
rules:
Smash

When this ally deals Smash damage, put a 1 [MELEE] / 1 [HEALTH] Treant ally token into play for each Smash damage dealt.

name: Amara Kells
rules: When this ally enters play, she deals 2 arcane damage to target hero.

name: Zalabar the Dark Tinkerer
rules:
Elusive

At the end of your turn, this ally deals 1 shadow damage to target hero for each ally in that hero's controller's graveyard, and then this ally heals that much damage from your hero.
flavour: Powerful ancient artifacts? A lost civilization? This is my kind of place.

name: Velen, Prophet of the Naaru
rules: At the end of your turn, Velen deals 5 unpreventable holy damage to target opposing [HORDE] or Monster hero or ally. If that character is dealt fatal damage this way, draw a card.
flavour: Where faith dwells, hope is never lost.

name: Taliax the Ironjaw
rules:
Protector

While you control a weapon, double this ally's ATK.

While you control an armor, double this ally's [HEALTH].

name: Shadowseer Thraner
rules: When this ally enters play, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an ability, ally, or equipment, target opponent removes cards from the top of his deck from the game equal to that revealed card's cost.

name: Sergeant Corsetti
rules: When this ally enters play, she deals 2 melee damage to target exhausted opposing hero or ally.
flavour: The first thing you learn in this line of work is to pick your battles.

name: Renzo Soulfang
rules: At the start of your turn, if you control fewer resources than each opponent, this ally deals 3 shadow damage to each opposing hero and heals 1 damage from your hero for each damage dealt this way.
flavour: We Gilneans know a thing or two about afflictions of the soul.

name: Philosopher Kirilenko
rules:
Protector

When this ally enters play, if your hero has 15 or more damage on it, this ally heals 7 damage from your hero.
flavour: His defensive capabilities are some of the greatest the Alliance has ever known.

name: Thrall the Earth-Warder
rules:
Assault 5, Mend 5

When Thrall deals damage to an opposing hero, put a 5 [MELEE] / 5 [HEALTH] Earth Elemental ally token into play with Protector.
flavour: Taretha . . . Cairne . . . Aggra . . . I will not fail you. I will not fail this world!

name: Naasi
rules:
Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)

When this ally enters play, she heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: I have not forgotten you.

name: Kraven the Gravebound
rules: When this ally enters play, you may destroy another ally you control. If you do, put a 3 [MELEE] / 3 [HEALTH] Ghoul ally token into play.
flavour: And I was just starting to like you, too.

name: Kedan Burstbeard
rules: When this ally enters play, if you control an equipment, this ally may deal 1 arcane damage to each opposing hero and ally.
flavour: The Cataclysm rekindled his desire to master the arcane arts.

name: Kalaan
flavour: I've hunted elekk—I doubt I'll have trouble with you.

name: Jarius Blackwood
rules: When 1 or more damage is healed from a hero or ally you control, you may pay [1]. If you do, put a 1 [MELEE] / 1 [HEALTH] Treant ally token into play.
flavour: Life finds a way.

name: Jaelen the Ripper
rules:
Elusive, Stealth

When this ally deals fatal damage, he also deals 5 melee damage to target opposing hero.
flavour: Catching enemies unprepared is my specialty.

name: Gretta Grindstone
rules: This ally has +1 [HEALTH] and Protector while you control an armor.
flavour: Each new battle sharpens my skills like I sharpen my blade.

name: Elementalist Arax
rules: This ally has Assault 1 and Mend 1 for each equipment you control.
flavour: Farseer Nobundo has taught me that the elements give us a variety of gifts.

name: Goetia
rules: You pay [3] less to play this ally if you played an ability this turn.
flavour: Your resolve will burn away more quickly than your armor.

name: Earthseer Dambrak
rules:
Harmonize

When you play another ally with cost [4] or more, you may pay [1]. If you do, draw a card.
flavour: To truly master the elements, ye must find the harmony within them, lad.

name: Mogdar the Frozenheart
rules: Deckbuilding: You can't put [HORDE], [ALLIANCE], or Talent cards in your deck.
flavour: Frozen, lifeless, shiny like diamonds. Mogdar hopes you will like your cold future.

name: Darkstalker Soran
rules:
Elusive

When this ally deals combat damage to a defending hero for the first time each game, this ally has Allies you control have +2 / +2 until he leaves play.
flavour: The stench of fear lingers in the air, and it will lead me right to you.

name: Crankston Deathspark
rules:
Elusive (This ally can't be attacked.)

Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: Even in undeath, small stature has its benefits.

name: Baradis Darkstone
flavour: Great power lies deep within the earth . . . but why stop there?

name: Bishop Ketodo
rules: Mend 1 (At the start of your turn, this ally may heal 1 damage from target hero or ally.)
flavour: He's known far and wide for making sure that the pieces fall into place.

name: Ashton Barstow
rules: You pay [2] less to play this ally if an opponent controls an ally with cost 4 or more.
flavour: You get the little guys. The big one's all mine.

name: Alaria the Huntress
rules: This ally has +4 ATK while attacking a hero.
flavour: I will defeat you not because I struck first, but because you lack skill.

name: Aaron Goodchilde
rules:
Eternal, Protector

When this ally is destroyed, your hero may deal 1 melee damage to target damaged ally for each resource you control.
flavour: A hero in word and deed.

name: Power
rules:
Attach to target ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 ATK.
flavour: Strength comes in many forms.

name: Wisdom
rules: Draw two cards.
flavour: Even knowledge has a price.

name: Monstrous Strength
rules: Monster heroes and allies you control have +2 ATK this turn.
flavour: Cower before the tempest storm! —Siamat, Lord of the South Wind

name: Mistress Nesala
rules: Deckbuilding: You can't put [HORDE], [ALLIANCE], or Talent cards in your deck.
flavour: Couldn't resist, could you?

name: Monstrous Regeneration
rules:
Attach to target friendly Monster ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 / +1 and Mend 1. (At the start of your turn, it may heal 1 damage from target hero or ally.)

name: Monstrous Heal
rules: Your hero heals 3 damage from each Monster hero and ally you control.

name: Courage
rules:
Attach to target ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 [HEALTH].
flavour: Bravery against all odds.

name: Thrall's Patience
rules:
Ongoing: On your turn: Exhaust an Aspect of Thrall ability you control >>> Put a 2 [MELEE] / 1 [HEALTH] Earth Elemental ally token into play.

When your hero attacks, if you control four exhausted Aspect of Thrall abilities, destroy all four of them. If you do, search your deck and/or hand for a master hero named Thrall and put it into play.

name: Thrall's Fury
rules: Ongoing: On your turn: Exhaust an Aspect of Thrall ability you control >>> Your hero deals 1 fire damage to target opposing hero.
flavour: We must now travel to the Firelands. Within that realm, Go'el's burning spirit could become as terrible as Ragnaros himself! —Aggra

name: Thrall's Doubt
rules: Ongoing: On your turn: Exhaust an Aspect of Thrall ability you control >>> Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavour: The winds now tear at his body and mind, leaving nothing but shreds of flesh and doubt. —Cyclonas

name: Thrall's Desire
rules: Ongoing: On your turn: Exhaust an Aspect of Thrall ability you control >>> Your hero heals 1 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: A final vision! Ancestors...could those be... our children? —Aggra

name: Terrifying Shout
rules: Put target ally or equipment on top of its owner's deck.
flavour: I never get tired of this. —Steelguard Adamson

name: Fearless Strike
rules: Weapons you control have +4 ATK this turn.

name: Guardian's Endurance
rules:
Ongoing: Your hero has Protector. (It can exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)

Your hero has +5 [HEALTH] while you control an equipment.
flavour: It's a bit easier to be brave when you're wearing sixty pounds of metal. —Steelguard Adamson

name: Jasani, Shrine Keeper
rules: Deckbuilding: You can't put [HORDE], [ALLIANCE], or Talent cards in your deck.
flavour: I have made peace with my choices, and I will give my life if it means the continued safety of the wild.

name: Concussion Blow
rules:
Protection Talent (You can't put Arms Talents or Fury Talents in your deck.)

Exhaust target hero or ally.

Ongoing: [1], [ACT] >>> The next time target exhausted hero or ally would be dealt damage this turn, it's dealt double that much instead.

name: Champion's Shout
rules: Ongoing: Allies you control have +1 / +1 for each equipment you control.
flavour: It don't matter what you say, as long as you say it real loud while you wave your weapon! —Jak the Bilgewater Bruiser

name: Hand of Gul'dan
rules:
Demonology Talent (You can't put Affliction Talents or Destruction Talents in your deck.)

Your hero deals 6 shadow damage to target hero or ally. If an ally is dealt fatal damage this way, put a token copy of that ally into play under your control. That copy is also a Demon.

name: Frenzied Doomguard
rules:
Smash

If this ally would deal Smash damage, it deals that much +2 instead.

name: Drain Soul
rules: Your hero deals 2 shadow damage to target ally and heals 2 damage from itself.
flavour: Give yourself to me. —Mistress Nesala

name: Dark Intent
rules:
As an additional cost to play, put 2 damage on your hero.

Attach to target friendly ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 / +2.

If attached ally would deal fatal combat damage to an opposing ally, remove that ally from the game instead.
flavour: Malice is contagious. —Skodis the Nethertwister

name: Boundless Hellfire
rules:
Eternal (When this enters your graveyard from anywhere, you may shuffle it into your deck.)

Your hero deals 1 fire damage to each hero and ally for each resource you control.

name: Unleashed Rage
rules:
Enhancement Talent (You can't put Elemental Talents or Restoration Talents in your deck.)

Attach to target ally you control.

Ongoing: Your hero has Assault X, where X is attached ally's ATK.

name: Force of Earth
rules: Target hero or ally has +1 ATK and Sentinel this turn. (The first time it exhausts each turn, ready it.)
flavour: Find your place within the elements. —Samaku, Hand of the Tempest

name: Call of Lightning
rules: Your hero deals 5 nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target heroes and/or allies.
flavour: Siamat is not the only one with power over the storms. —Janvaru the Thunderspeaker

name: Arc Heal
rules: Your hero heals 4 damage divided as you choose from any number of target friendly heroes and/or allies.
flavour: The elements will show you that all things are linked together. —Janvaru the Thunderspeaker

name: High Guardian Malosun
rules: Deckbuilding: You can't put [HORDE], [ALLIANCE], or Talent cards in your deck.
flavour: Siamat was a fool for returning our power to us. Did he really think he could stand against us?

name: Trickster's Reflex
rules: Monster heroes and allies you control have Stealth and can't be targeted by opponents this turn.

name: Ancestral Revival
rules:
Play only on an opponent's turn.

Put target ally that was destroyed this turn from your graveyard into play with damage on it equal to its [HEALTH] -1.
flavour: We'll get ye back as good as new, lass! Well, almost. —Earthseer Dambrak

name: Slaughter
rules: Destroy target ally or weapon with cost 4 or less. If you do, add +1 ATK counters to a weapon you control equal to the ATK of the card destroyed this way.

name: Restless Blades
rules:
Combat Talent (You can't include Assassination Talents or Subtlety Talents in your deck.)

Ongoing: Weapons you control have +1 ATK.

Your hero has Infinite Wield. (You can control any number of one-handed Melee weapons and strike with any number of one-handed Melee weapons during the same combat.)

name: Monstrous Rush
rules:
As an additional cost to play, remove up to five [ROGUE] abilities in your graveyard from the game.

Choose that many of the following: Assault 3, Long-Range, Sentinel, Smash, and Stealth.

Target Monster hero or ally has the chosen powers this turn.

name: Extortion
rules:
Ready and gain control of target opposing ally until end of turn.

It has Ferocity and Stealth this turn, and can attack only heroes this turn.
flavour: I think you'll find I can be highly persuasive. —Mistress Nesala

name: Decisive Strike
rules: Exhaust target hero or ally, and your hero deals 2 melee damage to it.
flavour: He's out, or he's dead. Either way, he won't bother us again. —Sana the Black Blade

name: Shadowy Apparition
rules:
Shadow Talent (You can't include Discipline Talents or Holy Talents in your deck.)

Ferocity

This ally has +1 ATK while attacking heroes for each opposing card removed from the game.

If this ally would deal damage to a hero, remove that many cards from the top of that hero's controller's deck from the game instead.

At the end of your turn, put this ally into its owner's hand.

name: Shadow Word: Corruption
rules:
Attach to target friendly Monster ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 / +1.

When attached ally deals combat damage to a hero, remove the top three cards of that hero's controller's deck from the game.

name: Augh
rules: Deckbuilding: You can't put [HORDE], [ALLIANCE], or Talent cards in your deck.
flavour: Augh da boss! Oh yeah!

name: Power Word: Resurrection
rules:
Attach to target ally.

Ongoing: When attached ally attacks, you may put target ally with cost less than attached ally's cost from your graveyard into play.
flavour: Nothing is ever truly lost. —Bishop Ketodo

name: Monstrous Intervention
rules: Monster heroes and allies you control have Invincible this turn.(They can't leave play, be targeted, or be dealt damage.)

name: Mind Shatter
rules: Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally. If a hero was dealt damage this way, its controller discards a card.
flavour: You can open your mind to me, or I can open it myself. —Mistress Nesala

name: Faithful Dispel
rules: Destroy target ability. Draw a card.
flavour: If you wish to face me, we will meet on equal ground. —High Priestess Neeri

name: Monstrous Vengeance
rules:
Ongoing: When a Monster ally you control is destroyed, you may destroy target opposing ally.

At end of turn, destroy this ability.

name: Tower of Radiance
rules:
Holy Talent (You can't include Protection Talents or Retribution Talents in your deck.)

This ability enters play with four radiance counters on it.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, remove a radiance counter from this ability. If none remain, destroy this ability.

Your hero has Assault 1 and Mend 1 for each radiance counter on this ability.

name: Hand of Devotion
rules:
Play only on an opponent's turn.

Your hero has Protector this turn. (It may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)

Your hero has Sentinel this turn. (The first time it exhausts each turn, ready it.)

name: Hammer of Vengeance
rules:
Exhaust target ready opposing ally. Your hero may deal unpreventable holy damage equal to that ally's ATK to another target ally.

Delve (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)

name: Divine Redemption
rules:
Put target ally from your graveyard into play and attach this ability to it.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +5 / +5, Protector, and Invincible. (It can't leave play, be targeted, or be dealt damage.)
flavour: The Light will never abandon me! — Anaka the Light's Bulwark

name: Blessing of Resolution
rules:
Attach to target Monster ally you control.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 / +2 for this and each other ability attached to it.
flavour: Be blessed by my hand and pledge yourself to cleanse Azeroth. —The Forgotten

name: Nexus-Thief Asar
rules:
[8] >>> Flip Asar face down.

You pay [8] less to flip Asar if an opposing hero was dealt damage three or more times this turn.
flavour: My analysis of the technology in Uldum has given me occasion to alter my goal.

name: Spark of Brilliance
rules: Draw two cards, then put a card from your hand on top of your deck.
flavour: Magic givesss me an endlesss sssupply of tricksss. —Lady Sira'kess

name: Wildfire
rules: Choose one: Your hero deals 5 fire damage to target hero or ally; or your hero deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally.
flavour: Can you outrun the flames? —Drazul the Molten

name: Polymorph: Pig
rules:
Attach to target opposing ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally becomes 1 / 1 and is also a Pig.

When attached ally is destroyed, your hero heals 3 damage from itself.
flavour: I'm in the mood for some pork ribs. —High Magus Olvek

name: Firestarter
rules:
Fire Talent (You can't put Arcane Talents or Frost Talents in your deck.)

Your hero deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally, or 4 if that character was dealt fire damage this turn.

name: Boundless Magic
rules:
Eternal(When this enters your graveyard from anywhere, you may shuffle it into your deck.)

Look at cards from the top of your deck equal to the number of resources you control. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Uberserc
rules:
Beast Mastery Talent (You can't put Marksmanship Talents or Survival Talents in your deck.)

This ally can attack two opposing heroes and/or allies at the same time. (This ally deals combat damage to both defenders, and both defenders deal combat damage back to this ally.)

name: Obliterating Trap
rules:
Trap (You may exhaust your defending hero rather than pay this card's cost.)

Destroy target attacking ally. If its cost is 4 or more, Delve.
flavour: Those ogres aren't the quickest of wit. —Gaxtro, Bilgewater Marksman

name: Interfering Shot
rules:
Attach to target ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally can't attack your hero.
flavour: I'll buy us some time. —Master Sniper Simon McKey

name: Hunter's Focus
rules: Target ally has +2 ATK and Long-Range this turn. (Defenders deal no combat damage to it.)
flavour: Hold steady until I give the order. —Master Sniper Simon McKey

name: Uldum
rules: [2], [ACT] >>> Choose one: Target weapon has +3 ATK this turn; or target armor has +3 [DEF] this turn.
flavour: Shielded from mortal eyes for centuries, Uldum's secrets have been unearthed by the Cataclysm.

name: Traitors!
rules:
Pay [1] to complete this quest.

Reward: An opponent chooses one: You draw a card; or your hero heals 3 damage from itself.
flavour: This unholy alliance of the Neferset with the minions of Deathwing does not bode well for us. —Prince Nadun

name: Thieving Little Pluckers
rules:
If you control two or more equipment: Pay [2] to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Take this mallet, crafted by the titans, blessed by the sun-kings and who-knows-what-else, and smash the runts! —Nomarch Teneth

name: The Forgotten
rules:
[8] >>> Flip The Forgotten face down.

You pay [8] less to flip The Forgotten if you control an ability, an ally, and an equipment.
flavour: All must be cleansed; it is my purpose, my entire reason for being.

name: Cobra Sting
rules:
Attach to target opposing hero.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 nature damage to attached hero.

At the end of your turn, if attached hero was dealt 5 or more damage this turn, ready all resources you control.

name: Tailgunner!
rules:
If you control an ally with an ability attached to it: Pay [2] to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: I've got a plan for our escape, but it'll require a lot of guts and a little luck. —Harrison Jones

name: Gnomebliteration
rules:
Pay [5] and remove any number of allies in your graveyard from the game to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw a card, or two cards if you removed five or more allies this way.
flavour: My analysis reveals you might feel . . . 'guilt' as a result of such high fatality numbers. —A.I.D.A.

name: The Fall of Neferset City
rules:
On your turn: Pay [2] to complete this quest.

Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an ally, target ally you control has +2 ATK and Ferocity this turn. (It can attack immediately.)
flavour: If we take down Dark Pharaoh Tekahn, the immortal colossi will fall and our armies will be able to march into Neferset City. —King Phaoris

name: The Defense of Nahom
rules:
If there are two or more classes among allies you control: Pay [5] to complete this quest.

Reward: Draw two cards.
flavour: We will get no further reinforcements. Let us hope we can stop the Neferset advance. —Salhet

name: Spire of Scarlet Pain
rules:
On your turn: [2], [ACT] >>> Your hero deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally for each ally you control.

When an ally you control exhausts, you may ready this weapon.

name: Zoid's Firelit Greatsword
rules:
Exhaust an ally you control >>> Add a charge counter to this weapon.

While this weapon has six or more charge counters on it, it has +6 ATK.

name: Scepter of Power
rules:
Exhaust an ally you control >>> Add a tone counter to this weapon.

While this weapon has four or more tone counters on it, it has Harmonize.(You pay [1] less to play allies with cost [4] or more.)
flavour: The Titans created us to keep watch over their wondrous works. - High Guardian Malosun

name: Ruthless Gladiator's Decapitator
rules: When you strike with this weapon, you may remove target ally in a graveyard from the game. If you do, this weapon has +ATK this turn equal to the ATK of that removed ally.

name: Obsidium Cleaver
rules: You pay [3] less to strike with this weapon while you control an ally with an ability attached to it.

name: Overpowered Chicken Splitter
rules: When this weapon enters play, you pay [4] less to strike with it this turn.
flavour: Good for splittin' other things besides chicken, too, actually. —Master Sniper Simon McKey

name: Wild Wrath
rules: Your hero deals 2 nature damage to target ally. Put a 1 [MELEE] / 1 [HEALTH] Treant ally token into play.
flavour: Too much is never enough. —Wildseer Varel

name: Lava Bolt Crossbow
rules: Long-Range (When you strike with this weapon on your turn, defenders deal no combat damage to the attacker.)
flavour: I'm honestly not sure how you load this thing. —Jasani, Shrine Keeper

name: Ko'gun, Hammer of the Firelord
rules: If an opposing hero was dealt 6 or more damage this turn: [ACT] >>> Put three 2 [FIRE] / 1 [HEALTH] Fire Elemental ally tokens into play.
flavour: Even I could not craft a finer weapon. —Nadina the Red

name: Feeding Frenzy
rules:
Dual Wield

At the start of your turn, destroy this weapon unless you remove an ally in your graveyard from the game.
flavour: The perfect tool for weaving pain and suffering. —Mistress Nesala

name: Hammer of Sparks
rules: At the end of your turn, your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero for each ally you control with 6 or more ATK.
flavour: Dun'zarg burn hand on stupid hammer! —Dun'zarg

name: Fandral's Flamescythe
rules: When this weapon enters play, put a 2 [FIRE] / 2 [HEALTH] Flame Cat Monster ally token into play.
flavour: Revenge is best served flaming hot.

name: Biting Wind
rules: [3], [ACT] >>> Your hero deals 1 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack or protect this turn.
flavour: Al'Akir reigns over the winds of the world.

name: Barim's Main Gauche
rules: This weapon has +3 ATK for each ally you control with 6 or more ATK.
flavour: You handle the planning. I'll focus on execution. —Sergeant Corsetti

name: Variable Pulse Lightning Capacitor
rules:
When you play an ability, you may add an overload counter to this item.

On your turn: [2], [ACT], Destroy this item >>> Destroy all abilities, allies, and equipment with cost less than or equal to the number of overload counters on this item.
flavour: Gets static cling in m'beard like ye wouldn't believe. —Earthseer Dambrak

name: Spurious Sarcophagus
rules:
[ACT] >>> Remove target card in your graveyard from the game. If you do, add a revive counter to this item.

[ACT], Remove five revive counters from this item >>> Put target card that was removed from the game this way into your hand.
flavour: Nothin' quite like crackin' one o' these open! —Brann Bronzebeard

name: Rune of Zeth
rules:
When this item enters play, Delve. (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)

[4], [ACT], Destroy this item >>> Draw two cards.
flavour: The servants of Ragnaros used these runes to weave fire magic.

name: Wild Rejuvenation
rules:
Attach to your hero.

Ongoing: At the start of your turn, put a 1 [MELEE] / 1 [HEALTH] Treant ally token into play if your hero is undamaged. Otherwise, your hero heals 1 damage from itself.
flavour: Elune's blessings are truly boundless. —Jasani, Shrine Keeper

name: Apparatus of Khaz'goroth
rules: Your hero has Assault 1. (It has +1 ATK on your turn.)
flavour: Khaz'goroth shaped mountains and canyons with his will, but he shaped us dwarves as well. —Earthseer Dambrak

name: Setesh, Construct of Destruction
rules:
Your hero has Assault 1.

At the start of your turn and when your hero deals combat damage to an opposing hero, add a power counter to this item.

At the end of your turn, if this item has five or more power counters on it, destroy it. If you do, put two 0 [SHADOW] / 4 [HEALTH] Void Wurm ally tokens into play with Assault 4.

name: Rajh, Construct of the Sun
rules:
Your hero has Protector.

At the start of your turn and when you play an ally, add a power counter to this item.

At the end of your turn, if this item has five or more power counters on it, destroy it. If you do, put a 6 [FIRE] / 6 [HEALTH] Construct ally token into play with Protector.

name: Isiset, Construct of Magic
rules:
If your hero would deal non-combat damage, it deals that much +1 instead.

At the start of your turn and when you play an ability, add a power counter to this item.

At the end of your turn, if this item has five or more power counters on it, destroy it. If you do, put three 1 [ARCANE] / 1 [HEALTH] Construct ally tokens into play with If your hero would deal non-combat damage, it deals that much +1 instead.

name: Ammunae, Construct of Life
rules:
Your hero has If damage would be healed from a hero or ally you control, that much +1 is healed instead.

At the start of your turn and when 1 or more damage is healed from a hero or ally you control, put a power counter on this item.

At the end of your turn, if this item has five or more power counters on it, destroy it. If you do, put six 0 [NATURE] / 1 [HEALTH] Bloodpetal ally tokens into play with Mend 1.

name: Poison Fang Bracers
rules:
When this armor enters play, put two 1 [MELEE] / 1 [HEALTH] Treant ally tokens into play.

[2], [ACT] >>> Your hero deals 1 nature damage to target opposing hero for each token ally you control.

name: Scalp of the Bandit Prince
rules:
When you play a card with cost 6 or more, add a scalp counter to this armor.

At the start of your turn, if this armor has three or more scalp counters on it, your hero deals 6 melee damage to target opposing hero.
flavour: Well, I won't be following his example. —Nexus-Thief Asar

name: Pauldrons of Roaring Flame
rules: [2] >>> Your hero has Protector this turn. (It may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: My resolve was tempered in the heat of the Firelands. —Steelguard Adamson

name: Mantle of Master Cho
rules: [ACT], Name a standard class >>> Target ally you control has that class and loses all other classes this turn.
flavour: I don't know who Master Cho is, but I like his taste in clothes! —High Magus Olvek

name: Helm of Setesh
rules:
On your turn: [4], [ACT] >>> Put a 2 [SHADOW] / 2 [HEALTH] Void Seeker ally token into play.

Token allies you control have Assault 1. (They have +1 ATK on your turn.)
flavour: Yes! Harness . . . your . . . hatred. —Setesh

name: Primal Madness
rules:
Feral Talent (You can't put Balance Talents or Restoration Talents in your deck.)

Ongoing: Your hero has Assault 3, Mend 3, Protector, and Stealth.

At the end of your turn, you may ready your hero.
flavour: Embrace da many forms dat da wild has to offer, mon. —Fama'sin the Lifeseer

name: Helm of Blazing Glory
rules: While your hero has 5 or less remaining health, double the ATK of weapons you control and double the [DEF] of armor you control.
flavour: Hey, if you gotta go out, that's a pretty good way to do it. —Jak the Bilgewater Bruiser

name: Gloves of Dissolving Smoke
rules: When an ally you control attacks, your hero has +1 ATK this turn.
flavour: Twist in flames, interlopers! —Shannox

name: Flickering Cowl
rules: On your turn: [1], [ACT] >>> Target ally has +1 / -1 this turn.
flavour: Beth'tilac's burning venom can be a blessing or a curse, depending on how you apply it.

name: Flickering Shoulders
rules: On your turn: [ACT] >>> Target ally has Smash this turn. (If it would deal more than fatal combat damage to a defending ally, it deals the rest to that ally's controller's hero.)

name: Bulwark of the Primordial Mound
rules: When this armor enters play, exhaust target opposing hero or ally.
flavour: Dust . . . to dust. —Earthrager Ptah

name: Anraphet's Regalia
rules: Your hero has Mend 1. (At the start of your turn, it may heal 1 damage from target hero or ally.)
flavour: Full unit self-defense routines are now active. —Anraphet

name: White Camel
rules:
Elusive

When you place a resource face up into your resource row, this ally has +3 ATK and Sentinel this turn.
flavour: Careful, they spit! —Brann Bronzebeard

name: Harrison Jones
rules: At the start of your turn, target an ability or equipment you control. Then target an opposing card that shares a type with that targeted card. You and that opposing card's controller exchange control of those cards.;(received errata))
flavour: See ya 'round, kid!

name: Aggra
rules:
When Aggra enters play, choose two of the following: Assault 4, Elusive, Mend 4, or Untargetable.

Aggra has the chosen keywords until she leaves play.
flavour: Hear me, Go'el! You are not alone!

name: Sand Scarab
rules: If an opposing ally would be destroyed, you may remove it from the game instead.
flavour: We're gonna need a bigger boot. —Brann Bronzebeard

name: Natural Purification
rules: Destroy target ability or equipment with cost less than or equal to the number of token allies you control.
flavour: The forest gives much to us, but we must give back to it in turn. —Jasani, Shrine Keeper

name: Siamat, Lord of the South Wind
rules:
Monster Hero Required

When Siamat enters play, exhaust all [HORDE] and [ALLIANCE] allies.

[HORDE] and [ALLIANCE] allies can't ready.

At the start of your turn, put a 2 [NATURE] / 1 [HEALTH] Air Elemental ally token into play for each exhausted [HORDE] and [ALLIANCE] ally.
flavour: I. AM. UNLEASHED!

name: Renshol, Herald of Nature
rules: Empower Druid: When this ally enters play, if you control another Druid hero or ally, this ally heals 3 damage from target friendly hero or ally. Then put a 1 [MELEE] / 1 [HEALTH] Treant ally token into play for each damage healed this way.
flavour: See how Cenarius favors his children.

name: Pygmy Pyramid
rules:
Monster Hero Required

Elusive, Mend 2, Protector,

When this ally is destroyed, put three 1 [MELEE] / 1 [HEALTH] Pygmy Monster ally tokens into play, the first with Elusive, the second with Mend 2, and the third with Protector.

name: Pygmy Firebreather
rules: Empower Monster: When this ally enters play, if you control another Monster hero or ally, draw a card.

name: Obsidian Colossus
rules:
Protector

If this ally would be destroyed, remove all damage from it, exhaust it, and add three stone counters to it instead.

At the start of your turn, remove a stone counter from this ally. If none remain, ready this ally.

While this ally has a stone counter on it, it can't ready and has Invincible. (It can't leave play, be targeted, or be dealt damage.)

name: Lockmaw
rules: When Lockmaw enters play, you may destroy target opposing damaged ally. If you do, put a 1 [MELEE] / 1 [HEALTH] Crocolisk Monster ally token into play for each damage on that destroyed ally.

name: Akhet
rules:
Protector

While Akhet is the only ally in play, double his ATK and [HEALTH], and he has Sentinel.
flavour: A king's time as ruler rises and falls like the sun.

name: Bazul, Herald of the Fel
rules: Empower Warlock: When this ally enters play, if you control another Warlock hero or ally, this ally deals 3 shadow damage to target opposing hero and heals 3 damage from your hero.
flavour: Our lord gives us many gifts, but I prefer to take mine from you instead.

name: Araxian, Herald of Trickery
rules: Empower Rogue: When this ally enters play, if you control another Rogue hero or ally, your hero has +4 ATK this turn.
flavour: Let it never be said that rogues can't work together.

name: Mark of Restoration
rules:
Attach to target friendly ally.

Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 / +2.

When attached ally attacks, it heals damage equal to its ATK from each friendly hero and ally.

name: Pythisss, Herald of Frost
rules: Empower Mage: When this ally enters play, if you control another Mage hero or ally, you may draw two cards.
flavour: I wasss inssstructed by the mossst powerful sssorceresss in the world. What hope do you have?

name: Swifteye
rules: This ally has +3 / +3 for this and each other Murloc hero and ally you control.
flavour: Mlmmlmmm, Lgmlmmlmmm Rmm Llmmmggmgllr.

name: Kresss, Herald of the Hunt
rules: Empower Hunter: When this ally enters play, if you control another Hunter hero or ally, this ally deals 2 ranged damage to each of up to two target heroes and/or allies.
flavour: The tidesss of ssstrife are upon usss!

name: Slimefin
rules: This and other Murloc allies you control can't be targeted by opponents.
flavour: Lrmmgrrgg Lrgm Mlmlmd Rrrgmmmm Mlmmmgllgmmlmlr Mmgmglglm Mrrrgll Ggmm.

name: Shiverspine
rules: When this or another Murloc ally you control deals damage to an opposing hero, this ally heals that much damage from your hero.
flavour: Mmgmlmlg Mggmlmmmrmmrmrmrrr Mmgmgllglr, Mggmlmmmrmmrmrmrrr Mgmmlglr!

name: Ragespike
rules: This and other Murloc allies you control have Assault 1. (They have +1 ATK on your turn.)
flavour: Rr'gg Lgmlmm Glmmmlglgmmlm Rmmmlglgmmlmlr.

name: Nargle, Fang of the Swarm
rules: At the end of an opponent’s turn, remove this ally from the game. If you do, destroy all non-Murloc allies, then players put all Murloc allies from their graveyards into play.;(received errata)
flavour: Mmmglrmmmmlrml Lgmlmm Rllmmrlmmgl!

name: Frizzlight
rules: Damage that this and other Murloc allies you control would deal is unpreventable.
flavour: Llmrrglrl Gggmlmmm Gmmmrmrmlgrrglmm.

name: Zuglisch
flavour: Even the simplest ogre is not to be trifled with—and this one is astoundingly simple.

name: Zores, Herald of War
rules: Empower Warrior: When this ally enters play, if you control another Warrior hero or ally, target weapon you control has +2 ATK and you pay [2] less to strike with it this turn.
flavour: ZORES STEP LOUDEST AND CARRY BIGGEST STICK!

name: Zog, Herald of Death
rules: Empower Death Knight: When this ally enters play, if you control another Death Knight hero or ally, target opponent puts the top three cards of his deck into his graveyard.
flavour: Kneel before Zog!

name: Siphon of Undeath
rules: Destroy target ally. If you control a Ghoul, your hero heals 5 damage from itself.
flavour: Death and decay: both are inevitable. —Barathex, Undeath's Hand

name: Mok'drul
rules: Empower Monster: When this ally enters play, if you control another Monster hero or ally, heroes and allies you control have +3 ATK and Smash this turn.

name: Korbash the Devastator
rules:
Conspicuous

When this ally enters play, exhaust a target opposing hero or ally for each Ogre hero and ally you control. Characters exhausted this way can't ready this turn or next turn.
flavour: KORBASH STRONGEST THERE IS!

name: Gorlash, Herald of the Elements
rules: Empower Shaman: When this ally enters play, if you control another Shaman hero or ally, this ally deals 4 nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target heroes and/or allies.
flavour: GORLASH GET YOU . . . AND YOU . . . AND YOU TOO!

name: Dun'zarg
rules: When this ally attacks for the first time each turn, he has +4 ATK this turn while you control another Ogre hero or ally.
flavour: Dun'zarg just need you to stand in front of him for minute . . .

name: Taluret, Herald of Faith
rules: Empower Priest: When this ally enters play, if you control another Priest hero or ally, you may have target player shuffle all allies from his graveyard into his deck.
flavour: Return from whence you came, infidels!

name: Neferset Shieldguard
rules: Mend 1, Protector, Sentinel (The first time this ally exhausts each turn, ready it.)
flavour: Neferset City shall not fall, and neither shall we!

name: Okumet, Herald of the Light
rules: Empower Paladin: When this ally enters play, if you control another Paladin hero or ally, prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target hero or ally this turn.
flavour: None know the power of the sun better than we who dwell in Uldum.

name: Neferset Shadowstalker
rules:
Sentinel (The first time this ally exhausts each turn, ready it.)

When this ally attacks, another target hero or ally has +2 ATK this turn.
flavour: We've had thousands of years to comprehend the weakness of flesh.

name: Neferset Shadowlancer
rules: When this ally enters play, if you control an equipment, your hero has +2 ATK while attacking this turn.

name: Neferset Sentry
rules: On your turn: Exhaust another ally you control >>> This ally has +2 ATK this turn.
flavour: Meet my gaze and feel my wrath, outsider.

name: Raise the Dead
rules: Put a 3 [MELEE] / 3 [HEALTH] Ghoul ally token into play.
flavour: There is such beauty in death. —Ghoulmaster Kalisa

name: Neferset Scorpid Keeper
rules: When this ally enters play, if you control an equipment, target opponent chooses and discards a card.
flavour: Some Neferset keep dangerous beasts of the desert sands as their pets.

name: Neferset Runecaster
rules:
Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)

Sentinel (The first time this ally exhausts each turn, ready it.)
flavour: The runes have foretold that your journey ends here.

name: Neferset Flamecaller
rules: Sentinel (The first time this ally exhausts each turn, ready it.)
flavour: We are freed from our curse, and you will be freed from your mortal shell.

name: Neferset Frostbringer
rules: Sentinel (The first time this ally exhausts each turn, ready it.)
flavour: Don't move, intruder. Not that you can.

name: Neferset Champion
rules:
Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)

Sentinel (The first time this ally exhausts each turn, ready it.)
flavour: You have come far, intruders, but your bones will lay here forever.

name: Neferset Bladelord
rules: When this ally enters play, if you control an equipment, this ally has Ferocity this turn. (It can attack immediately.)
flavour: Siamat has undone the Curse of Flesh that plagued us! We cannot be stopped!

name: High Oracle Naseem
rules:
Protector

This ally has all standard classes in all zones.
flavour: The Neferset come to me for guidance. Infidels come to me for death.

name: Harbinger Sefu
rules:
While you control one or more equipment, this ally has Stealth.

While you control two or more equipment, this ally has Ferocity.

While you control three or more equipment, this ally has Sentinel.
flavour: With the power of Titan artifacts, he was formidable; with the power of Siamat, he's unstoppable.

name: General Husam
rules:
Protector, Sentinel

Husam enters play with four +1 / +1 counters.

When an ally you control attacks, add a +1 / +1 counter to Husam.

If Husam would be dealt damage, remove that many +1 / +1 counters from him instead.
flavour: Invaders, you shall go no further!

name: Zindalan
rules:
Harmonize

When this ally enters play, put a 0 [NATURE] / 3 [HEALTH] Totem token into play with Earth Totem (1) and Ongoing: Harmonize.;(received errata)
flavour: Zindalan and da elements gotcha back, mon.

name: Frozen Strength
rules:
Attach to target ally, then Delve. (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)

Ongoing: Attached ally has +4 ATK.

name: Zanrix Steelboot
rules: [3], Exhaust an equipment you control >>> Exhaust target ally.
flavour: What do you get? A boot to the head!

name: Wrex
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: You don't mess with the Wrex.

name: Yunzo the Hexer
rules: [X], [ACT] >>> This ally deals X shadow damage to target opposing hero, then heals that much damage from your hero.
flavour: Yunzo gonna send ya back where ya came from, mon.

name: Veliana Felblood
rules: At the end of your turn, you may destroy another ally you control. If you do, this ally deals 5 fire damage to target opposing hero.
flavour: Sorry, sweetie.

name: Trickster Tesslah
rules: Assault 2 (This ally has +2 ATK on your turn.)
flavour: I'm Kezan's greatest assassin. Then again, I've got some bias.

name: Thanu Sunhorn
rules:
Protector

When damage is healed from your hero, your hero may heal that much damage from target ally.;(received errata)
flavour: Our sun, An'she, is the right eye of the Earthmother. I am her right hand.

name: Sunstalker Maelan
flavour: The greatest rogues need no shade to hide from sight.

name: Soulstealer Adams
rules: When this ally deals fatal combat damage while attacking, draw a card.
flavour: The Neferset have a long history of crafting powerful curses. I'll put their knowledge to practical use.

name: Sludgelauncher Krillzix
rules: When this ally enters play, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If you reveal an ability, ally, or equipment this way, this ally deals nature damage equal to that card's cost to each other hero and ally.
flavour: Straight from Bilgewater's finest drainpipes to you! Now that's service!

name: Seraxa Brightmix
rules:
Elusive

Each ally you control with an ability attached to it has +2 / +2.
flavour: I'm the best priest money can buy.

name: Boundless Winter
rules:
Eternal (When this enters your graveyard from anywhere, you may shuffle it into your deck.)

Your hero has +1 ATK this turn for each resource you control.
flavour: Let's kick some ice! —Mogdar the Frozenheart

name: Raso'jin
rules:
Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)

When this ally enters play, put two 1 [MELEE] / 1 [HEALTH] Treant ally tokens into play.

This ally has +1 ATK for each token ally you control.

name: Nadina the Red
rules:
Protector

At the end of each opponent's turn, if your hero wasn't dealt damage this turn, you may draw a card.
flavour: I'm the perfect fusion of Light and might.

name: Lor'themar Theron, Regent Lord
rules:
Each player plays with the top card of his deck revealed.

On your turn, you may play any cards revealed this way. (Pay costs as normal.)
flavour: The blood elves will endure any hardship, overcome any obstacle, and emerge stronger than before.

name: Ishael Bloodlight
rules: This ally has Protector and Sentinel while an ability is attached to him.
flavour: The Reliquary has sent me in search of ancient power hidden beneath the sands of Uldum, and I will not rest until I find it.

name: Kaelzin
rules: Mend 2 (At the start of your turn, this ally may heal 2 damage from target hero or ally.)
flavour: Da blessing of da wind be even greater in da Windlord's domain.

name: Harudu Cloudshot
rules: This ally has +4 ATK while attacking an ally with cost 4 or more.
flavour: Oh, the things you can learn from hunting kodo.

name: Grok Goreblade
rules: This ally has +2 / +2 while you control an equipment.
flavour: It feels good to wield my axe again, for the glory of the Warchief and the Horde!

name: Galvano the Beast Lord
rules:
When this ally enters play, choose Loyal Spider, Angry Wolf, or Cunning Monkey.

If you chose:

Loyal Spider: Put a 1 [MELEE] / 6 [HEALTH] Spider ally token into play with Protector.

Angry Wolf: Put a 2 [MELEE] / 1 [HEALTH] Wolf ally token into play with Ferocity and Sentinel.

Cunning Monkey: Put a 2 [MELEE] / 2 [HEALTH] Monkey ally token into play with When this ally deals damage to an opposing hero, draw a card.

name: Deathguard Ashleigh
rules:
You pay [2] less to play equipment, to a minimum of [1].

Weapons you control have +2 ATK.

Armor you control have +2 [DEF].
flavour: I'm something of a specialist with these particular implements.

name: Dakturak
rules: Stealth (This ally can't be protected against.)
flavour: Going into these tombs alone was an unwise choice . . . for you.

name: Dark Pharaoh Tekahn
rules:
[8] >>> Flip Tekahn face down.

You pay [8] less to flip Tekahn if you have seven or more allies in your graveyard.
flavour: You will pay for this intrusion!

name: Blood Parasite
rules:
Blood Talent (You can't put Frost Talents or Unholy Talents in your deck.)

Put three 1 [MELEE] / 1 [HEALTH] Bloodworm Monster ally tokens into play.

Ongoing: When a token ally you control is destroyed, it heals 2 damage from your hero.
flavour: Perfectly willing to die for the greater good. How quaint. —Barathex, Undeath's Hand
